# About Me

Hi! I'm **Chia Ming Zhao**, a passionate learner currently pursuing a degree in **Applied Computing**, specializing in **FinTech**, at the **Singapore Institute of Technology**. 

Previously, I graduated from **Temasek Polytechnic** with a diploma in **Big Data Management and Governance**, where I honed my skills in data analytics and governance practices. 

This website is a space where I share my journey, projects, and experiences. Stay tuned to explore more about me!
